summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements. REQ-1 is fully implemented with female voice narration using Web Speech API in audioBus.ts, respecting voiceEnabled settings. REQ-2 is comprehensively implemented with enhanced visuals showing progressive system initialization stages, status indicators (pending/active/complete), progress bar, and synchronized timing with voice narration in BootSequenceOverlay.tsx.

hallucinated_features.description: CRT power-on sound effect during boot sequence (boot-crt-noise.mp3)
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation adds audio SFX playback with 'audioBus.playSfx('/assets/audio/boot-crt-noise.mp3', 0.15)' at the start of the boot sequence. This audio feature was not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: CSS styling updates for increased orange saturation and improved visual hierarchy throughout the HUD
hallucinated_features.reason: The index.css file shows modifications to the color system and panel styling that appear to be global HUD enhancements rather than boot sequence specific changes. The BuildRequest constraints explicitly state 'Changing the overall HUD theme or color scheme' is a non-goal.
